name: open-data-api
description: Open dataset API and website powered by Cloudflare Workers and D1

scripts.db:reset:local: npx wrangler d1 execute open-data-db --local --file=./scripts/reset.sql && npx wrangler d1 execute open-data-db --local --file=./migrations/0001_create_tables.sql && npx wrangler d1 execute open-data-db --local --file=./migrations/0002_create_indexes.sql && npm run seed && npx wrangler d1 execute open-data-db --local --file=./scripts/seed-generated.sql
scripts.db:reset: npx wrangler d1 execute open-data-db --file=./scripts/reset.sql && npx wrangler d1 execute open-data-db --file=./migrations/0001_create_tables.sql && npx wrangler d1 execute open-data-db --file=./migrations/0002_create_indexes.sql && npm run seed && npx wrangler d1 execute open-data-db --file=./scripts/seed-generated.sql
